beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 4 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name is humming|a low, happy tune.

beats.text: |VS| Stuck in some vines, you and $hero_name find a new page. |VS| ‘Look at that thatch work. Tight weave. Thick leaves. Not even the monsoon rains could get through this roof. A master builder made this, Little man-cub,’ |VS| pointing at a tunnel made of vines at a park in $storyNeighborhood.

‘Much better than those... gigantic things out there’ |VS| said $hero_name in disdain. |VS| ‘Look at that building near the avatar_amenity. Square. Grey. Humans live in stone boxes stacked like firewood. But this? This is a palace ’
‘Ah, perfect. A root for a pillow, moss for a blanket. The 'Bare Necessities' are right here under your nose’ |VS| said $hero_name, shaking his body, resting in some bushes.

|VS| After a couple of hours of resting, $hero_name says |VS|’I could sleep for a week... but we have miles to cover. Our page search is not finished, little man-cub.’ |VS| $hero_name said while stretching, |VS| ‘Now…let’s find the next page’
